form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Heller (for himself and Mrs. Murray) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize per diem payments under comprehensive service programs for homeless veterans to furnish care to dependents of homeless veterans, and for other purposes.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Creating a Reliable Environment for Veterans' Dependents Act .

section.header: Authorization of per diem payments for furnishing care to dependents of certain homeless veterans
section.text: Section 2012(a) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: Services for which a recipient of a grant under section 2011 of this title (or an entity described in paragraph (1)) may receive per diem payments under this subsection may include furnishing care for a dependent of a homeless veteran who is under the care of such homeless veteran while such homeless veteran receives services from the grant recipient (or entity).
